Pak Ui Chun Meets U.S. Assistant Secretary of State 
   Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- Pak Ui Chun, minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, met and conversed with Christopher Hill, assistant secretary of the U.S. Department of State, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him.

North Side's Delegation Leaves for Seoul 
   Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the north side led by Vice-Premier of the Cabinet Jon Sung Hun left here today by air to participate in the first meeting of the inter-Korean committee for economic cooperation to be held in Seoul.

   Pyongyang, December 4 (KCNA) -- A delegation of officials in charge of foreign affairs of the Laotian People's Army led by Siphay Munduang, director of the External Relations Department of the Ministry of Defence, arrived here today.

Canciller coreano se reune con Christopher Hill
   Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ATCC) -- El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun departio este martes en el capitalino Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con Christopher Hill, asistente del secretario de Estado de Estados Unidos, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia, y su comitiva.

Delegacion nortena parte para la 1a reunion del CCCE
   Pyongyang, 4 de diciembre (ATCC)-- La delegacion de la parte Norte encabezada por el viceprimer ministro del Consejo de Ministros Jon Sung Hun partio este martes de esta capital por via aerea para tomar parte en la primera reunion del Comite Conjunto de Cooperacion Economica Norte-Sur de Corea que va a efectuarse en Seul.
